file_insights.primary_change: Added import and export of TikTokShopAgent

details.formatting: Trailing comma added to CompetitorAgent entry to maintain consistency

patterns_discovered.description: Consistent pattern for registering new agents in the module's __init__.py
patterns_discovered.implementation: Import agent class, then add to __all__ export list

patterns_discovered.description: Maintains explicit __all__ list for public API clarity
patterns_discovered.benefit: Clear contract of what is exported from the agents module
Reduces diff noise in version control when adding new items

gotchas_discovered.context: New agent import placed with other agent imports in alphabetical/logical order
gotchas_discovered.risk: Incorrect placement could impact code readability and maintainability

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: __all__ list must be kept in sync with imports
gotchas_discovered.context: Both the import statement and __all__ list must be updated together
gotchas_discovered.risk: Missing export from __all__ would make the class unavailable for external imports despite the import statement being present

approach_outcome.description: TikTokShopAgent successfully registered in the module's public API
approach_outcome.efficiency: Straightforward one-step registration following established patterns

recommendations.recommendation: Maintain alphabetical ordering of imports and __all__ exports when adding new agents
recommendations.rationale: Improves code organization and makes it easier to locate items in the list

recommendations.recommendation: Verify TikTokShopAgent class exists at ai-content-agents/agents/tiktok_shop_agent.py before registration
recommendations.rationale: Import errors would only surface at module load time

recommendations.recommendation: Add automated tests to verify all registered agents in __all__ can be imported
recommendations.rationale: Prevents import errors and ensures module integrity

recommendations.recommendation: Update module-level docstring if present to document the TikTokShopAgent availability
recommendations.rationale: Helps developers understand available agent options
